extension.news:
1.0.4 (2017-06-03) - inform about redirects to external sites (see https://github.com/generia/plugin.video.zdf_de_2016/issues/5) - fixes for minor labeling issues after updates on zdf.de
1.0.3 (2017-02-19) - provide sub-titles for video, if available on zdf.de (see https://github.com/generia/plugin.video.zdf_de_2016/issues/3) - Gotham support, lowered xbmc.python version to '2.14.0' (see https://github.com/generia/plugin.video.zdf_de_2016/issues/4)
1.0.2 (2017-01-28) - fix for github issue#2 ('Meistgesehen' is empty) after ZDF website update - make sure that search-history store-path exists - minor fixes for parsing teaser-lists
1.0.1 (2016-12-03) - added rubrics: Live-TV, Shows A-Z - added search history - added parsing of video links in module-content elements - added settings to configure item label information - re-shaped parsing after ZDF website update (fix for broken search) - re-worked video player launching (based on "setResolvedUrl()")
1.0.0 (2016-11-12) - Initial version after relaunch of zdf.de end of October 2016
